name: MulticallBnbShim
description: designed to manage bnb whitin other BEP20 tokens while using a multicall contract.

functionDecorators.name: allowance
functionDecorators.description: Allowance is not required for bnb transfers. It returns a large number to make the UI work.

functionDecorators.name: balanceOf
functionDecorators.description: Returns an account's bnb balance following a BEP20 call interface.
